category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_material_datasheet_request_workflow
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the workflow to instantiate when a "Request Material Datasheet" action is invoked. The default value is "Request Material Datasheet".
